title: Elon Musk says SpaceX should receive clearance to attempt second Starship launch this week

title: Europe needs to be strategic with its space ambitions, DLR head says
summary: Europe needs to choose its space priorities wisely and work to boost capabilities or face suffering overreach, a leading official says.

title: Space Competition Enters the Gray Zone
summary: In the evolving landscape of space warfare, conflict is shifting into what experts commonly call the “gray zone.”

title: RIDE! Wins ESA PUSH Contract to Offer Ariane 6 Launch Capacity
summary:
French launch aggregator RIDE! has won an ESA contract to offer its services free of charge to customers interested in launching payloads aboard the maiden Ariane 6 flight in 2024. The contract is part of the agency’s Programme for Userbase Enhancement (PUSH), which aims to provide a platform for companies that offer “groundbreaking space-related products […]
The post RIDE! Wins ESA PUSH Contract to Offer Ariane 6 Launch Capacity appeared first on European Spaceflight.
